meanings.def: a buffoon in one of the old comedies, or someone who is a stupid incompetent fool
meanings.example: The zany is funny.

meanings.def: indicating the absence of any or all units under consideration

meanings.def: prompt willingness

meanings.def: excessive fervor to do something or accomplish some end

meanings.def: a feeling of strong eagerness, usually in favor of a person or cause
